name: Dicey Football (Schu)
description:
Please wishlist on Steam!

Dicey Football is a strategy sports game where you manage a team of birds playing football. Roll dice and assign them to your athletes to maneuver, score goals, and earn seeds to improve your team.

This page contains the demo version for Boston Festival of Indie Games. Full game will be released early 2023.

Follow me on Twitter for updates!
